title: #201: Live from Mel's Diner with Real Housewife Lea Black
description:
Lea Black of "The Real Housewives of Miami" returns to the podcast to talk "Real Housewives of New York City" and "Secrets & Wives" with Ben Mandelker (bsideblog.com) and Ronnie Karam (trashtalktv.com). Along the way, there are special cameos from Lea's hot interior designer friends and our various waitresses (because, oh yeah, we recorded from a corner booth in Mel's Diner).
The episode is a blast, and Lea gives us all sorts of unfiltered insight from her time on "RHOM." Definitely worth listening to!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
